body: Don’t worry guys, it looks like the couple from Vanilla Pocket, but they are in fact not them as the girl has a smaller bust and buttons her uniform which Seira never did. Yuuto also ALWAYS wears glasses because he can’t see for shit (jk). He never takes those suckers off even in the last chapter with them. That’s why there’s no cheating or netorare tag cus these two are probably just friends. So enjoy!
Fuck. why would you ruin the rest in the series with him cheating.
Also, @DanteΩ, thanks! I didn't realise there was an English version of that

@Kirbin all day
Personally, I hated the netorare bits of this one, but it's at least interesting, I suppose. /112577/
@KuhakuMaster Plain and simple vanilla is great, but there needs to be more development. I wouldn't go so far as to say this  had a 'fantastic' ending. This is more like it: /174043/
@KuhakuMaster I will admit I like vanilla but all that other exciting stuff is good from time to time
It miss me so much this kind of hentai ; Vanilla, love without complicated plot, no harem, no mother or daughter, no ntr - cheating or ugly bastard shit, and a fantastic and good ending.
This is actually good but only 8 pages?  Huh
That was a little off-putting, but cute, I guess?
My dick fell asleep thanks to this doujinshi.
It' kinda hilarious  that the artist is just called "emily"
